text: Mgbanwe n'ọdịdị na-agbakwunye ọdịdị kejenetiki ọhụrụ, ma nhọpụta na-ewepụ ya n'ogwu ọdịdị nke a kọwapụtara.
translated_text:
Igbo: Tọkị bụ oke osimiri gbara ya gburugburu n'akụkụ atọ: Oke osimiri Aegean n’ọdịdaanyanwụ, Oke osimiri Ojii n’ugwu na Oke osimiri Mediterranean na ndịda. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Igbo: Na mbido agha ha nọ na-aga naanị n’elu mmiri mana a ihe nnataozi n'ikuku bidoro rụwa ọrụ nke ọma ụgbọokpurummiri enweghizi ihe ọzọ ọ ga-eme n'abụghị ịgbada n'okpuru mmiri ka a ghara ịhụ ya. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Igbo: Mgbanwe n'ọdịdị na-agbakwunye ọdịdị kejenetiki ọhụrụ, ma nhọpụta na-ewepụ ya n'ogwu ọdịdị nke a kọwapụtara. 
English:: The change in technology has also led to a new generation of submarines.
clean_output: : The change in technology has also led to a new generation of submarines.

text: Kemgbe 1988, ụmụ igbe ntuli aka ga-abụrịrị ngafe-ahụ-ụzọ ka ndị ntụli aka na ndị nnyota ga-agba akaebe na o nweghị envelopu nọ na ya mgbe a na-ebido ntuli aka nakwa o nweghị envelopu etinyere ewezụga nke ndị agụgwere ọnụ ma nye ikikere nke ọma.

Igbo: Tọkị bụ oke osimiri gbara ya gburugburu n'akụkụ atọ: Oke osimiri Aegean n’ọdịdaanyanwụ, Oke osimiri Ojii n’ugwu na Oke osimiri Mediterranean na ndịda. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Igbo: Na mbido agha ha nọ na-aga naanị n’elu mmiri mana a ihe nnataozi n'ikuku bidoro rụwa ọrụ nke ọma ụgbọokpurummiri enweghizi ihe ọzọ ọ ga-eme n'abụghị ịgbada n'okpuru mmiri ka a ghara ịhụ ya. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Igbo: Kemgbe 1988, ụmụ igbe ntuli aka ga-abụrịrị ngafe-ahụ-ụzọ ka ndị ntụli aka na ndị nnyota ga-agba akaebe na o nweghị envelopu nọ na ya mgbe a na-ebido ntuli aka nakwa o nweghị envelopu etinyere ewezụga nke ndị agụgwere ọnụ ma nye ikikere nke ọma. 
English: Since 1988, submarines must be equipped with a sonar system to prevent them from being mistaken for a mine.
clean_output: Since 1988, submarines must be equipped with a sonar system to prevent them from being mistaken for a mine.

Igbo: Tọkị bụ oke osimiri gbara ya gburugburu n'akụkụ atọ: Oke osimiri Aegean n’ọdịdaanyanwụ, Oke osimiri Ojii n’ugwu na Oke osimiri Mediterranean na ndịda. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Igbo: Na mbido agha ha nọ na-aga naanị n’elu mmiri mana a ihe nnataozi n'ikuku bidoro rụwa ọrụ nke ọma ụgbọokpurummiri enweghizi ihe ọzọ ọ ga-eme n'abụghị ịgbada n'okpuru mmiri ka a ghara ịhụ ya. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Igbo: N'ihi nke a ndị na-eme ihe ngosi na-ese igbo n'ebe ngosi ihe, ndị nwe ụlọ ngosi ihe na-akwadokwa ndị nlere anya ka ha sonye. 
English:: The submarines were forced to go underwater to avoid being seen.
clean_output: : The submarines were forced to go underwater to avoid being seen.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Igbo: Na mbido agha ha nọ na-aga naanị n’elu mmiri mana a ihe nnataozi n'ikuku bidoro rụwa ọrụ nke ọma ụgbọokpurummiri enweghizi ihe ọzọ ọ ga-eme n'abụghị ịgbada n'okpuru mmiri ka a ghara ịhụ ya. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Igbo: Dị ka oké mmiri ozuzo ahụ ka toro aka site n’imetụ n’ala, ọ ka na-ara ahụ inyocha etu o nwere ike isi metụta United States ma ọ bụ Caribbean. 
English:: As the Atlantic Ocean is to the west, the Caribbean Sea is to the north and the Gulf of Mexico is to the south, Turkey is in the path of the Atlantic Ocean and the Caribbean Sea.
clean_output: : As the Atlantic Ocean is to the west, the Caribbean Sea is to the north and the Gulf of Mexico is to the south, Turkey is in the path of the Atlantic Ocean and the Caribbean Sea.

text: Ọ kara taa ahụ n'okpuru marịa ma kara gbaa agba n'okpuru ụmụ ala ugwu ugwu ahụ.
